mapper.select: SELECT message_receive_user_seq , user_nickname , MAX(m.message_date) AS message_date FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.message_receive_user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE m.message_send_user_seq = #{loginUserSeq} AND m.message_sender_deleted_yn = 'N' GROUP BY message_receive_user_seq, user_nickname ORDER BY message_date DESC
